Room.Name: Mehetable's Golden Apple Tree
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing beneath a golden apple tree, in front of Mehetable's hut.
Room.LongDescription: The tree rustles in the cool breeze, and you see a single, golden apple sway on its branch near the center of the limbs. The tree is in robust health, and looks like it could produce golden apples for a good many years.
